H0.text: who holds the record for most everest summits. Apa Sherpa

H1.text: who holds the record for most everest summits. Phu Dorji Sherpa

H2.text: who holds the record for most everest summits. Yuichiro Miura

H3.text: who holds the record for most everest summits. Kami Rita

A4.text: On 16 May 2018, at age 48, Rita became the first person in the world to climb Mount Everest 22 times, achieving the record of the most summits on the 8,848-meter (29,031-foot) peak.

A5.text: In 2017, Rita was the third person to reach the summit of Mount Everest 21 times, sharing this record with Apa Sherpa and Phurba Tashi Sherpa.
